summary: This is an arrest warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York for Ghislaine Maxwell, commanding law enforcement to arrest her for charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury. The warrant was issued by Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith in White Plains, NY.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual named in the arrest warrant, accused of multiple offenses related to the enticement and transportation of minors, as well as perjury.

persons.name: Lisa Margaret Smith
persons.context: The issuing officer who signed the arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Issuance of Arrest Warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A U.S. magistrate judge issued an arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell based on an indictment, charging her with conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was formally charged with multiple federal crimes including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.
The arrest warrant was issued on June 29, 2020, by U.S. Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith in White Plains, NY.
The case is filed under docket number 20 CR 330 in the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York.
